name: Suppliers Manager for Woocommerce
author: WP-Shopping

sections.description:
With Suppliers Manager for Woocommerce, you can :

  • List your suppliers with extra informations (address, contact, etc.)
  • Link Woocommerce products with suppliers
  • Follow product stocks for each supplier

Please, see our PRO version for more features : Suppliers Manager for Woocommerce PRO
sections.installation:
• Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/suppliers-manager-for-woocommerce directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
• How can I add a supplier to Woocommerce?
    Go in the ‘Supplier’ section and click on the ‘New’ button.

  • How can I attach products to a supplier?
    Go on the product page and set ‘supplier’ field. You can find it in the product datas metabox.
    You can also set the supplier for one or many products by using the products table bulk action ‘set supplier’.

  • Does this plugin work with all WordPress versions?
    This version works with WordPress 4.6 and better. If you’re using an older version, some bugs can happen.
sections.changelog:
0.2.0 (2019-05-05)

  • Make this plugin ready for PRO version

0.1.0 (2019-04-18)

  • Create a new page for supplier’s products list
  • Add settings page

0.0.20 (2019-04-16)

  • Add “part number” field in WC Product
  • Hide custom post type editor
  • Exit plugin if Woocommerce is not running
  • Fix CSS issues on Products list

0.0.14 (2018-12-26)

  • FIX some PHP warnings

0.0.13 (2018-12-06)

  • Add “state” field in supplier informations

0.0.12 (2018-12-05)

  • Delete product supplier informations when supplier moved to trash

0.0.11 (2018-12-05)

  • Fix some bugs

0.0.10 (2018-12-04)

  • Add columns to products table
  • Fix traductions
  • New onboarding for supplier creation
  • Improve “Go PRO” page design

0.0.7 (2018-12-03)

  • Add contact informations for supplier

0.0.6 (2018-11-23)

  • Fix missing JS file
  • Fix bulk action

0.0.5 (2017-11-30)

  • Allow sorting on supplier products table

0.0.4 (2017-11-05)

  • Add packaging in WC Product
  • Add delivery time to supplier informations

0.0.3 (2017-10-27)

  • Add translation files (FR, EN)

0.0.2 (2017-10-20)

  • Allow variable product to have distinct supplier informations

0.0.1 (2017-10-18)

  • Create custom post type
  • Link Woocommerce products to supplier
